headline.main: China to Encourage Foreign-Invested Firms to List, Issue Bonds: Xinhua
headline.print_headline: China to Encourage Foreign-Invested Firms to List, Issue Bonds: Xinhua

lead_paragraph: China will encourage foreign-invested firms to list and issue bonds in the country, state news agency Xinhua reported on Sunday, citing a government work report.
snippet: China will encourage foreign-invested firms to list and issue bonds in the country, state news agency Xinhua reported on Sunday, citing a government work report....
